00112 // 0 <= kth <= sizeK; 0 <= xth <= sizeX
00113 long Store2D::GetIndex( long IndexDim1_, long IndexDim2_ ) const
00114 {
00115   return ( IndexDim1_*(SizeDim2+1) + IndexDim2_ );
00116 }
00117 
00118 double Store2D::GetCoordDim1( long IndexDim1_ ) const
00119 {
00120   return ( MinDim1 + static_cast<double>(IndexDim1_) * StepDim1 );
00121 }
00122 
00123 double Store2D::GetCoordDim2( long IndexDim2_ ) const
00124 {
00125   return ( MinDim2 + static_cast<double>(IndexDim2_) * StepDim2 );
00126 }
00127 
00128 void Store2D::GetCoords( long IndexDim1_, long IndexDim2_,
00129                                  double& ValDim1, double& ValDim2 ) const
00130 {
00131   ValDim1 = GetCoordDim1( IndexDim1_ );
00132   ValDim2 = GetCoordDim2( IndexDim2_ );
00133 }
